game.title: Balatro
game.description: Highly addictive and satisfying, Balatro is a magical combination of card games like Solitaire and Poker, giving you the chance to break the rules in a way you've never seen before!

specifications.languages: Bahasa, Deutsch, English , Español (España), Español (Mexico), Français, Italiano, Nederlands , Polski , Português, Русский, 日本語, 简体中文, 繁體中文, 한국어

achievements.name: Ante Up!
achievements.description: Reach Ante 4.

achievements.name: Ante Upper!
achievements.description: Reach Ante 8.

achievements.name: Heads Up
achievements.description: Win a Run.

achievements.name: Low Stakes
achievements.description: Win a run on at least Red Stake difficulty.

achievements.name: Mid Stakes
achievements.description: Win a run on at least Black Stake difficulty.

achievements.name: High Stakes
achievements.description: Win a run on at least Gold Stake difficulty.

achievements.name: Card Player
achievements.description: Play at least 2500 Cards.

achievements.name: Card Discarder
achievements.description: Discard at least 2500 Cards.

achievements.name: Nest Egg
achievements.description: Have $400 or more during a single run.

achievements.name: Flushed
achievements.description: Play a Flush with 5 Wild Cards.

achievements.name: Speedrunner
achievements.description: Win a run in 12 or fewer rounds.

achievements.name: ROI
achievements.description: Buy 5 vouchers by Ante 4.

achievements.name: Shattered
achievements.description: Break 2 Glass Cards in a single hand.

achievements.name: Royale
achievements.description: Play a Royal Flush.

achievements.name: Retrograde
achievements.description: Get any poker hand to level 10.

achievements.name: 10K
achievements.description: Score 10,000 Chips in a single hand.

achievements.name: 1,000k
achievements.description: Score 1,000,000 Chips in a single hand.

achievements.name: 100,000K
achievements.description: Score 100,000,000 Chips in a single hand.

achievements.name: Tiny Hands
achievements.description: Thin your deck down to 20 or fewer cards.

achievements.name: Big Hands
achievements.description: Have 80 or more cards in your deck.

achievements.name: You Get What You Get
achievements.description: Win a run without rerolling the shop.

achievements.name: Rule Bender
achievements.description: Complete any challenge run.

achievements.name: Rule Breaker
achievements.description: Complete every challenge run.

achievements.name: Legendary
achievements.description: Discover a Legendary Joker.

achievements.name: Astronomy
achievements.description: Discover every Planet card.

achievements.name: Cartomancy
achievements.description: Discover every Tarot card.

achievements.name: Clairvoyance
achievements.description: Discover every Spectral card.

achievements.name: Extreme Couponer
achievements.description: Discover every Voucher.

achievements.name: Completionist
achievements.description: Discover 100% of your collection.

achievements.name: Completionist+
achievements.description: Win with every deck at Gold Stake difficulty.

achievements.name: Completionist++
achievements.description: Earn a Gold Sticker on every Joker.

achievements.name: Platinum
achievements.description: Obtain all other trophies.
